name: gldt-swap-monorepo
description: GLDT frontend app and GLDT canister
author: Bochsler Consulting

scripts.build: echo "Please use the 'realbuild' script (this is to avoid dfx to be able to call for a unwanted build by itself)"
scripts.realbuild: npm run build:front && npm run build:back
scripts.build:back: cargo build --target wasm32-unknown-unknown --target-dir canister/gldt_core/target --release --locked --future-incompat-report -p gldt_core && npm run wasm:optimize
scripts.wasm:optimize: ic-wasm canister/gldt_core/target/wasm32-unknown-unknown/release/gldt_core.wasm -o canister/gldt_core/target/wasm32-unknown-unknown/release/gldt_core_canister.wasm shrink --optimize O3 && npm run wasm:compress
scripts.lint:front: cd client && npm run lint && cd ..
scripts.deploy: npm run lint && dfx deploy --network staging
scripts.start: dfx stop && dfx start --background --clean && npm run lint && dfx deploy
scripts.restart: cd client && npm run stop; npm start && cd ..
scripts.test: echo "No tests yet! Please write some unit tests!"
scripts.postinstall: cd ./client && npm install && cd ..; echo 'If installing locally, you should also ensure that ic-wasm is installed (cargo install ic-wasm)'
